item.title: More seniors are becoming homeless. Shelters are trying to adapt
item.description: Older adults are the fastest-growing homeless population across the U.S. Now some shelters are trying to make it easier to accommodate older people.

item.title: Wegovy pill now available at pharmacies
item.description: The Wegovy pill approved in December arrived at pharmacies nationwide on Monday. Patients now have a new way to take the weight loss medication.

item.title: 'People want to look good': Researcher hopes redesigned walker will remove stigma
item.description: People who need walkers are often reluctant to start using them because of stigma. A Colorado researcher has designed a walker she says has more appea...

item.title: Health officials slash the number of vaccines recommended for all kids
item.description: The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention is reducing the number of vaccines recommended for all children. The action follows a presidential memo...

item.title: Wegovy obesity pill now available at pharmacies
item.description: Drugmaker Novo Nordisk said the prescription medicine can be found at a range of pharmacies, including CVS and Costco, as well as some telehealth prov...
